ygData.subject: Re: Pred Base
ygData.msgSnippet: KIt Kat seemed to read Phobias mind, that was a good thing it would make her easier to predict. She was already showing leadership abilities wether she wanted

KIt Kat seemed to read Phobias mind, that was a good thing it would 
make her easier to predict. She was already showing leadership 
abilities wether she wanted to or not. Phobia followed Her to her 
quarters "As you wish my dear."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She looked at Phobia with sadness in her eyes. "Yeah, I know.  He 
> wants to rule the universe.  I can't blame him for that. It's in 
his 
> programming to be a great leader.  But, I...I...I just can't betray 
> him, even for my own good. it's in my programming.  I can't just 
not 
> obay him. Everything I do is for him. I know I can take the ship, 
and 
> maybe even leave Megatron behind. But I can't just do that to him.  
> Sure I get mad at him, but he is still my leader." she looked at 
the 
> floor feeling at a loss.  She was a pred who wanted what every 
other 
> Pred wanted, to get rich, destroy the maximals and all those who 
> stood in their way, to follow orders from thier leader.  But, now, 
> she was starting to question everything.  She had never faultered 
or 
> wavered from her programming before. Now, she was finding trouble 
> with every thought that entered her mind. She turned and looked at 
> the others.  She knew she had to be strong for them.  Now she felt, 
> not like that warrior and strong guide like she was used to, but 
like 
> a wolf pup who couldn't make up her mind on anything.  She suddenly 
> felt vulnerable.  She gave a brave smiled to the group.
> 
> "I have some things to attend to.  I shall need your help, Time 
Bomb, 
> Land Mine, Etchingar, Please make diagrams of all ideas you come up 
> with for entering the base.  Any other ideas on weapons, like the 
> liquid energon that Drillbit came up with, anything that you think 
> of, write it down, draw it up and I'll look at all of them in a 
> little while. This will be a team effort.  And it will take 
everyone 
> in the team to make this work."
> 
> She turned to Phobia,"Please see me in my quarters, we can talk 
> there."  She turned and walked out of the room and to her quarters.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > "Megatron wouldn't be happy" Phobia said, all eight eyes on Kit 
Kat.
> > "Megatron wants all power for himself, you take this ship and he 
> will feel
> > out foxxed by a wolf." the words weren't meant to sound so odd 
but 
> they were
> > true. "If you did something that he took credit for then he 
> wouldn't settle
> > for council status, he would attempt to overthrow the council."
> > 
> > he put his arm around KitKats shoulder "You know where you would 
be 
> stuck in
> > that hopeless war. Don't you?" his beedy little eyes focused on 
> hers.
> >
